schema.title: Request body of the echo method

jsonrpc.description: A String specifying the version of the JSON-RPC protocol. MUST be exactly "2.0".

id.description: An identifier established by the Client.

method.description: A String containing the name of the method to be invoked.

schema.title: Response body of the echo method

jsonrpc.description: A String specifying the version of the JSON-RPC protocol. MUST be exactly "2.0".

id.description: It MUST be the same as the value of the id member in the Request.

_rpcError.title: rpcError
_rpcError.description: REQUIRED on error. This member MUST NOT exist if there was no error triggered during invocation.

code.description: A Number that indicates the error type that occurred.

message.description: A String providing a short description of the error.

data.description: A Primitive or Structured value that contains additional information about the error.
